body_html: While I do agree the behavior is implementation dependent, this code is sipmly incorrect in the vast majority of cases, and I don’t think anyone will ever be hit by it. The “if you backward multiple times, grads get accumulated” invariant is still true, no matter if you ask us to retain buffers or not. It’s just that without those flags (which is not 100% correct) we can still satisfy your request and will proceed without an error. There’s nothin unexpected in it I’d say, and I don’t think spending time to do extra checks when they’re unnecessary is a good idea
